name: Mixed Cucumber Salad
description: This Mixed Cucumber Salad is not only a high-fiber, healthy choice but also caters to those looking for healthified recipes with a touch of indulgence. Perfect for anyone looking to enjoy a nutritious, yet delicious, meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and thinly slice the cucumber.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the mango and cut it into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the hard-boiled egg into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the imitation crab into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced cucumber, cubed mango, julienned carrots, chopped egg, imitation crab, and almonds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the ingredients gently to ensure they are well mixed. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
